Other Information.Additional Info: Negligible Cr leaching at pH 2; stable within pH 4–10
Negligible Cr leaching at pH 2; stable within pH 4–10

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion coupled with electrostatic repulsion between negatively charged membrane surface and nanoplastics

Experimental Validation.Method: Crossflow filtration system with synthetic wastewater
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Water permeability: 1204 Lm-2h-1bar−1; Rejection efficiency: >99% for both polyethylene and polystyrene nanoplastics

Other Information.Additional Info: Composite membranes fabricated by incorporating MIL-101(Cr) nanoparticles into a PA layer on a PES substrate; optimal concentration of 0.2 w/v%; excellent antifouling properties and reusability over six cycles
